com.wyattbyroade.cop2006.integration

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wyattbyroade.cop2006.integration.Weapon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cannon, Sword

    class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for creating Weapon objects and to set up the fields and methods for use with its subclasses.
    Author:
    Wyatt Byroade

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int condition
      condition int value to determine condition of weapon.
      protected double cost
      cost double, the cost to acquire weapon and influences the price received when selling.
      protected int hitPoints
      hitPoints int value to determine factor in attack strength.
      protected boolean inHand
      inHand boolean, to determine if the weapon is currently in hand and activated.
      protected boolean needsAmmo
      needsAmmo boolean, to determine if the weapon has expendable resource requirement.
      protected boolean playerOwns
      playerOwns boolean, to determine if the player owns the weapon.
      protected int skillWithWeapon
      skillWithWeapon int value used as a multiplier of attack strength.
      protected int weight
      weight int value to determine weight of weapon.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Weapon(double cost, int weight, int condition)
      Weapon constructor takes cost, weight and condition as arguments to instantiate an object of weapon or its subclasses.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int attack()
      attack method displays error for object of weapon class, to be overridden in subclasses.
      void demonstrateWeapon()
      demonstrateWeapon method identifies weapon, runs attack method and then holsters weapon.
      void holster()
      holster method puts weapon into holster or other non-ready state for transport.
      void increaseSkillLevel(double factor)
      increaseSkillLevel method multiplies current skillWithWeapon field by passed factor.
      double sellWeapon()
      sellWeapon method returns value of funds received and sets playerOwns field to false.
      void setHitPoints(int hitPoints)
      setHitPoints method sets the hitPoints field to determine attack strength of weapon.
      void unholster()
      unholster method returns weapon to hand and ready to attack state.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Weapon

        public Weapon(double cost,
              int weight,
              int condition)
        Weapon constructor takes cost, weight and condition as arguments to instantiate an object of weapon or its subclasses.
        Parameters:
        cost - double value contains cost of weapon
        weight - int value contains weight of weapon
        condition - int value contains condition of weapon(percent)

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        public int attack()
        attack method displays error for object of weapon class, to be overridden in subclasses.
        Returns:
        int value of attack strength returned to calling method

      • sellWeapon

        public double sellWeapon()
        sellWeapon method returns value of funds received and sets playerOwns field to false.
        Returns:
        double value of money received after selling returned to calling method

      • holster

        public void holster()
        holster method puts weapon into holster or other non-ready state for transport.

      • unholster

        public void unholster()
        unholster method returns weapon to hand and ready to attack state.

      • setHitPoints

        public void setHitPoints(int hitPoints)
        setHitPoints method sets the hitPoints field to determine attack strength of weapon.
        Parameters:
        hitPoints - int value represents hitPoints of particular weapon

      • increaseSkillLevel

        public void increaseSkillLevel(double factor)
        increaseSkillLevel method multiplies current skillWithWeapon field by passed factor.
        Parameters:
        factor - double value represents factor by which to multiply skillWithWeapon field

      • demonstrateWeapon

        public void demonstrateWeapon()
        demonstrateWeapon method identifies weapon, runs attack method and then holsters weapon.
